snippet.title: Nightmare: The Lunatic - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Nightmare: The Lunatic on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1842730/Nightmare_The_Lunatic

Nightmare: The Lunatic is an action roguelite platformer game where you escape your nightmare. Swap between 3 weapons constantly, use special attacks, and dodge and dodge enemy attacks. Strengthen yourself by collecting powerful and distinctive totems.

#trailer #gametrailers #games #gaming
